name: BEW Menu Cart
author: BriefcaseWP

sections.description:
Add Woocommerce and Easy Digital Download Menu Cart Widget to the popular free page builder Elementor.
Check out our Pro version on Briefcase Elementor Widgets.

  • More Menu styles
  • More Icons
  • Customize all the Woocommerce Mini Cart.
  • Modern Woocommerce Grid and EDD Grid to showcase your products
  • Create custom Woocommerce single product page.
  • Create custom Woocommerce shop page.
  • Create custom EDD single product page.
  • Create custom EDD shop page.
  • Woocommerce elements( Custom add to cart buttom, Woo price, Woo images, etc)
  • EDD elements( Custom add to cart buttom, EDD price, EDD details, etc)
sections.installation:
1. Upload BEW Menu Cart to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Done!
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload BEW Menu Cart to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Done!

I installed the plugin but it does not work

This plugin will only work with the Woocommerce or Easy Digital Download.
sections.changelog:
1.0.3

  • Fix – Some issues on Woo Cart Widget fragments.

1.0.2

  • Fix – Some issues on Woo Cart Widget for the new Woocommerce mini cart.
  • Add – Compatibility with OceanWp Theme.
  • Add – Compatibility with Astra Theme.
  • Tweak – Some CSS styles on Woo Cart Widget.

1.0.1

  • Fix – Some issues on Woo Cart Widget to be compatible with WordPress 4.9.4.
  • Tweak – Some settings improved in Woo Cart Widget.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.
